named-query.name: receipt.getBetween
named-query.query: FROM ReceiptEntity r WHERE r.receiptDate BETWEEN :start AND :end ORDER BY id

named-query.name: receipt.getLastByCashBox
named-query.query: FROM ReceiptEntity r WHERE r.id IN (SELECT MAX(r2.id) FROM ReceiptEntity r2 WHERE r2.cashBox.id = :cashBoxId)
